pageContext.claim: “In the first full month of my administration following the issuance of my executive orders, illegal immigration on our southern border fell by an unprecedented 40 percent. I want to congratulate General Kelly.”
pageContext.analysis: Apprehension numbers for February 2017 did decline by 40 percent, which hasn't happened in at least the past five years, PolitiFact found. But monthly apprehensions in fiscal year 2011 were regularly on par with apprehension figures from February, according to PolitiFact.
